-Playing killer in red ranks.
-Exit gates are allready open.
-Manage to hook all 4 players.
-One guy unhooks himself and saves everyone.
-Still managing to down everyone again.
-All 4 are crawling towards the exit.
-I pick the first one up; Get hit by DS. He escapes.
-I pick the second one up; Get hit by DS. He escapes.
-I pick the third one up; Get hit by DS. He escapes.
-I pick the fourth one up; Get hit by DS. He escapes.
-Post game chat, they tell me to stop tunneling.
---
10/10 would tunnel all 4 survivors again.

This happened to me couple months ago.
It's an asymmetrical pvp game where the balance is pretty off, but it's still fun nontheless and better than any 1 vs X competetor.
Just know that you'll have a lot of grinding to do, if you want to unlock every good ability for your survivor/killer.
This game has a lot of potential (had a ton of fun playing it), but the developers should work more on the bugs of the game. Apart from this, it is fun!

Fun game until you get tunneled by an ebony memento mori using killer. Get rid of/nerf all moris except cypress and I'd recommend it to my friends but only them
Super divertido, y me llevo unos sustos que me cago de miedo :v

While there are many things that can make thins game frustraiting, it is one of my favorite games. They do have a constant string of new bugs but are always hard at work fixing them. The gameplay when working correctly can be so much fun it wont matter if you win or lose!

mt foda so precisa tirar os killer pay to win ou nerfar pra krl.
serio mano o leatherface Ã© hit kill infinito, resumindo por 20 conto vc ganha qualquer partida.
NUB.
Fun addicting game. Devs are continuous updating and making changes to keep the game up to date. No other game out there that beats this style of game-play.

This asymmetrical horror survival masterpiece is unbelievably fun with friends, the only battle pass I've ever bought, and has been polished to near perfection. The vast array of characters and perks, killers and abilities, makes for loads of re-play ability. I would definitely recommend for any group of friends looking for the next big game to play together or even just fans of horror movies, this game has it all.

It's spooky and its spooky season
A great game with a great community and very active developers.

Great fun with friends as survivors, it's a good thrill trying to outsmart and outmanoeuvre the killer, but there is a bit of a learning curve to understand how to play. As the killer it's very satisfying murdering people. Do try to play with friends though, for as in most online games strangers are dicks.
